group_1.textLeft: It's been a few days,@but nothing's changed...

group_1.textRight: Nemu said nothing's diverged@from the past,
and it looks like Iroha's concept is being@automatically retrieved after all.

group_1.textLeft: Still, it's frustrating that all we can do@is slay Witches...
Recently, the lord of the Sumiya Clan passed@away and his son succeeded him,
but I don't know if he'd be willing to@enact a debt moratorium...
If we try helping them with the famine, though,@that would be messing with history...
What are we supposed to do...?!

group_1.textRight: My father will be returning from Sumiya's@palace by the end of the day.

group_1.textLeft: So the clan succession went off@without a hitch...

group_1.textRight: The reins have been passed from the terrible and@devious father to his weak and gutless son...
Still, with that settled, it should be@easier for us to move.

group_1.textLeft: Were you able to discuss the moratorium?

group_1.textRight: The new lord has not seen the land's@plight firsthand,
so I doubt he would believe it@if he were told.
If we enact the moratorium, however, our country@will lose revenue and become impoverished.
We'd be sitting ducks for the other nations, and all@the people we are sworn to protect would be lost...
Furthermore, we lack the force to seize@other territories for their resources.
Frankly, a debt moratorium is@fundamentally impractical...

group_1.textLeft: So all we can do is defeat@the Taito Gang causing all this...
If we can't find them, though,@fighting the Demons is all we can do.

group_1.textRight: Treating the symptoms,@and not the disease…
Speaking of Demons, I've heard rumors@of something they may be responsible for.
Could you two help me investigate?

group_1.textLeft: Of course! [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]But what kind of rumors@are we talking about?

group_1.textRight: Apparently, strange voices can be@heard on the beach.
…Aren't you crushed by this situation,@Princess Tsuyu?
You seem so tense all the time...

group_1.textLeft: As a noble, the only things I must@endure are games, poetry, and dance.
My ancestors would be ashamed if I dared@compare my suffering to those who are starving.
